alfredsnippet.snippet:
Johnson, Martin, Time, Knowledge and the Nebulae, Dover Publications, New York, 1947, p.41

"Martin Johnson tells us that Einstein followed up his 1905 success with a 'less certifiable sequel in 1915 which has in some of its implications led science astray.'"
alfredsnippet.name: Phys.org Post - Einstein's Less Certifiable Sequel in 1915
